title: HOUR 1 - Watson, Rodgers, Brady
itunes:title: HOUR 1 - Watson, Rodgers, Brady
description:
Colin discusses the NFL's decision to appeal the 6-game suspension for Deshaun Watson 

Aaron Rodgers is becoming more detached at this point in his career

Colin disagrees with people saying Tom Brady was tampering

 

Guest: Jeff Howe

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
